song_name: The Sun Shines Down On Me
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, The Sun Shines Down On Me is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: The Sun Shines Down On Me has sections analyzed in the following keys: A Major,  and A Mixolydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
